content.prompt: The sentiments expressed in the passage most directly indicate

choices.label: concerns about the spread of epidemic diseases
frustration over the establishment of forced labor systems
resistance to European colonial expansion and control

topic.text: 4.6: Internal and External Challenges to State Power from 1450 to 1750

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
